resources.string: This creature is made of pure evil and impenetrable darkness. Many believe that he is the Old God himself, considering how powerful he is. While others assumes that he is but a guardian of the Old God\'s chambers.

If you'll allow, Remixed Dungeon will collect usage statistics. That data will be used to:
 - spot and fix various minor glitches ( in case of a critical error, the game will explicitly ask you to send a report )
 - game balance improvements
 - fix device specific performance issues
 - publish funny statistics facts from time to time
 You can change your decision at any time (click the charts icon at the title screen )
